summary: Teh-Husky's Morrowind Armor mod that adds a dozen new armor & weapon sets inspired by TES: III Morrowind, in a balanced, lore-friendly and fully-integrated way Dragonborn friendly Edition!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=2][b][font=Verdana]=============================================================================
WHAT IS THIS:
=============================================================================[/font][/b][/size][/center]
[center]This mod was my attempt to make Morrowind Armor Compilation by Teh-Husky more Dragonborn friendly,
I keep this edit stay true to the original but naming conversion and little detail of course based on my taste
[font=Verdana][size=3][color=#ff0000][b]THIS MOD REQUIRES ORIGINAL MOD! THIS IS .ESP ONLY[/b]![/color][/size][/font]
[color=#1155Cc][/color][size=3][b][font=Verdana][color=#c9daf8][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22793]CLICK THIS LINK FOR ORIGINAL MOD![/url]﻿[/color][/font][/b][/size]
[font=Verdana][size=3][color=#ff0000][b]THIS MOD-MOD IS STANDALONE VERSION OF ORIGINAL! REPLACER IS A NO NO![/b][/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center][size=2][b][font=Verdana]=============================================================================
FEATURES AND CHANGES:
=============================================================================[/font][/b][/size][/center]
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]FEATURES: [/b][/size][/color]

[b]* 9 entirely new armor and weapon sets [/b]
﻿~ Chitin [renamed to[b] [color=#ff0000]Skyrim Chitin[/color][/b]]
﻿~ Bonemold
﻿~ Stalhrim [renamed to [b][color=#ff0000]Ice Armor[/color][/b]]
﻿~ Ringmail
~ ﻿Trollbone
﻿~ Dreugh
﻿~ Bear & Snow bear
~ Nordic Steel

* 3 variations of existing armor and weapon sets with unique appearances
﻿~ Gilded Ebony
﻿~ Vvardenfell Glass
﻿~ Antique orcish

* 6 new types of crafting components
﻿~ Dreugh Wax
﻿~ Treated chitin
﻿~ Troll bones
﻿~ Cured Pelts

* Full integration of new armor & weapons into leveled item lists
(treasure, random quest rewards, bandit equipment, merchant inventories)

[color=#ff0000][b][size=3]CHANGES FROM ORIGINAL:[/size][/b][/color]

[b]* Chitin Armor renamed to [color=#ff0000]Skyrim Chitin[/color][/b][b], you can craft it on[/b] [b][color=#ff0000]Chitin Category[/color][/b]
[b]* Stalhrim Armor and Weapon renamed to [color=#ff0000]Ice Armor and Weapon[/color][/b] [b]and you can craft on [/b][b][color=#ff0000]Stalhrim Category[/color][/b] [b]using [color=#ff0000]Frost Salt[/color][/b]
[b]* Bonemold Ingot [color=#ff0000]removed from leveled list[/color] you now [color=#ff0000][color=#ffffff]craft Armor [/color]using Bone Meal[/color] on [color=#ff0000]Bonemold Category[/color] like Dragonborn one
* [b]Bone[/b][b] Harvesting Tools only works for trolls[/b][/b]
[b]* [/b][b]NPC outfit removed due personal taste, sorry :P[/b]
author: Teh-Husky and RamonXick
